title: What are some of the most successful activist groups in history? - Quora

response.answer_text: Just from the top of my head and from contemporary history: - The bourgeoisie, who pulled out the French Revolution.- The colonial independentists rebels, who made the America Revolution.- The bolsheviks, who seized and controlled the Russian Revolution. One could find, I guess, plenty other groups in Asiatic or ancient history. Worth noting, though, that successful activists don't tend to label themselves as activist or rebels a posteriori, but patriots, defenders, rightful rulers or adjectives on those lines. The winners write the history...
